job.template:
SQS = data("NumberOfMessagesSent", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/SQS"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).scale(60).sum(by=["QueueName"])
RDS = data("DatabaseConnections", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/RDS") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("DBInstanceIdentifier", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["DBInstanceIdentifier"])
EC2 = data("CPUUtilization", filter=filter("stat", "mean") and filter("namespace", "AWS/EC2"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).mean(by=["InstanceId"])
SNS = data("NumberOfMessagesPublished", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/SNS") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("TopicName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["TopicName"]).scale(60)
CACHE_HITS = data("*Hits", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["CacheClusterId"])
CACHE_MISSES = data("*Misses", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/ElastiCache") and filter("CacheClusterId", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["CacheClusterId"])
CACHE = (CACHE_HITS / (CACHE_HITS + CACHE_MISSES) * 100)
CDN = data("Requests", filter=filter("stat", "sum") and filter("namespace", "AWS/CloudFront"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).scale(60).sum(by=["DistributionId"])
AUTOSCALING = data("GroupTotalInstances", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/AutoScaling") and filter("stat", "mean") and filter("AutoScalingGroupName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["AutoScalingGroupName"])
ELB = data("RequestCount", filter=filter("namespace", "AWS/ELB") and filter("stat", "sum") and filter("AvailabilityZone", "*") and filter("LoadBalancerName", "*"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).scale(60).sum(by=["LoadBalancerName"])
